creditline: Gift of funds from the Hersey Foundation and the National Endowment for the Arts
medium: Color lithograph, sugar-lift etching, aquatint, and collage (wooden stick, string)
provenance: [Russell Cowles Gallery, Minneapolis]; sold to MIA, 1978.
signed: Signed and dated on the side of collage element: Thomas A Rose 78
title: So Simple It's Often Overlooked
